data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 77 believers in Sinop that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sinop, Turkey
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Sinop to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.section_summary: On average, 12 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sinop, Turkey.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Sinop who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 203,378, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab, Iraqi people.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 77 believers in Sinop.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 204,600 citizens of the the state of Sinop.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Sinop to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

location.name: Sinop
location.people_groups_list: Karachai, Chechen, Arab, Syrian, Hemshin, Alawite
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Karachai (21,000), Chechen (112,000), Arab, Syrian (587,000), Hemshin (22,000), Alawite (554,000)
